Description:
Modern living in a private and picturesque position.
Occupying a private and peaceful position in a picturesque modern complex, this impressive town home, set well back from the street, manages to combine bright open living zones with contemporary tones across a magnificent double storey floorplan.
Polished wooden floorboards flow throughout a ground floor flooded with natural light, which incorporates a spacious open plan living and dining space and a stunning kitchen precinct.
Featuring stone benches and Bosch stainless steel appliances including a built-in gas cooktop, under bench oven, rangehood and dishwasher, a glass splash back, breakfast bar and plenty of storage, the kitchen really forms the centre-piece of this conducive layout.
A European laundry, powder room and sensational ground floor master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite provide added convenience on this level, before you head upstairs to two additional bedrooms with robes, a matching modern bathroom, retreat/study area and a sun-drenched private balcony.
A unique wrap-around backyard makes its way around the rear of the home, featuring 2 outdoor seating/entertaining decks, beautifully private gardens and rear access to the semi-enclosed double garage.
Reverse-cycle split-system heating/cooling, ducted heating, shade/blockout blinds and stone finishes further contribute to an amazing package.
Located for lifestyle within walking distance to Melba College, Ainslie Parklands Primary School and close to Burntbridge shops, cafes and restaurants.
Proximity to Croydon train station and enjoying easy access to Mount Dandenong Road, Maroondah Highway, Eastlink and the spectacular Eastland shopping and entertainment mecca.
